class.reporter:label: Circulation Matrix Circulation Modifier Subtest Circulation Modifier Set

Inter-system Copy Transit
class.oils_persist:source_definition: SELECT t.* FROM action.transit_copy t JOIN actor.org_unit AS s ON (t.source = s.id) JOIN actor.org_unit AS d ON (t.dest = d.id) WHERE s.parent_ou <> d.parent_ou
